metadata.methodology: Specific campaign promises verified from speeches, rallies, interviews, and campaign materials - focused on clear, repeated commitments with measurable outcomes

government_transparency.source: September 2024 Lex Fridman podcast, multiple interviews
government_transparency.exact_quote: I'd certainly take a look at it... I'm inclined to do the Epstein files
government_transparency.evidence: DOJ, FBI conclude Jeffrey Epstein had no 'client list,' committed suicide - July 7, 2025 DOJ memo

government_transparency.promise: Declassify JFK, RFK, and MLK assassination files
government_transparency.source: Waco, Texas rally March 25, 2023; repeated at Madison Square Garden rally October 27, 2024
government_transparency.exact_quote: I will release all remaining classified documents
government_transparency.evidence: Trump orders declassification of JFK, RFK, and MLK assassination files - signed January 23, 2025

immigration.promise: Carry out the largest deportation operation in American history
immigration.exact_quote: On Day 1, I will launch the largest deportation program in American history
immigration.evidence: 66,463 arrests and 65,682 removals in first 100 days - significant increase but well below pace needed for promised 1 million annual deportations

immigration.exact_quote: On Day One of his presidency he would issue an executive order, making clear to federal agencies that under the correct interpretation of the law, going forward, children born to undocumented immigrants would not automatically gain US citizenship
immigration.evidence: Jan. 23, federal judge blocked the order for 14 days, calling it 'blatantly unconstitutional'

immigration.source: Eagle Pass, Texas visit February 29, 2024; Prescott Valley, Arizona rally October 13, 2024
immigration.evidence: 80+ miles of new barriers initiated, $46.5 billion allocated in July 2025 'One Big Beautiful Bill'

immigration.promise: Make Mexico pay for the wall
immigration.exact_quote: I will build a great great wall on our southern border and I'll have Mexico pay for that wall
immigration.evidence: Mexico did not pay for the wall; its leaders have refused since Trump first made his promise... Taxpayers foot the bill for Trump's wall

immigration.source: Hialeah, Florida rally November 8, 2023; Des Moines, Iowa rally January 15, 2024
immigration.exact_quote: We will reinstate the Remain in Mexico policy
immigration.evidence: Policy reinstated on Day 1 of presidency

immigration.source: Aurora, Colorado rally October 11, 2024; Truth Social post September 15, 2024
immigration.exact_quote: End the CBP One app immediately
immigration.evidence: One of the first things the administration did was end Customs and Border Patrol's CBP One program

immigration.source: Youngstown, Ohio rally September 17, 2022; Waco, Texas rally March 25, 2023
immigration.exact_quote: I will designate drug cartels as foreign terrorist organizations
immigration.evidence: Trump's executive order began the process for designating cartels... but doesn't on its own designate them

economy.exact_quote: When I win, I will immediately bring prices down, starting on day one
economy.evidence: Despite a flurry of executive actions, Trump's price-related promises have gone unfulfilled... Day One has turned into Day Seven, and those eggs are getting even more expensive

economy.promise: End inflation and make America affordable again
economy.exact_quote: I will end inflation and make America affordable again
economy.evidence: Inflation has actually increased from 2.3% in April to 2.4% in May 2025
Congress passed no tax on tips in Trump's 'big, beautiful bill'... creates a temporary above-the-line deduction for tips up to $25,000

economy.source: Erie, Pennsylvania rally September 29, 2024; Tucker Carlson interview September 4, 2024
economy.evidence: Included in 'One Big Beautiful Bill' signed July 2025

economy.promise: Eliminate taxes on Social Security benefits
economy.exact_quote: No tax on Social Security benefits
economy.evidence: Trump says the Republican mega bill will eliminate taxes on Social Security. It does not - only provided $6,000 senior deduction, unrelated to Social Security. Social Security benefits remain fully taxable; this promise has not been seriously pursued.

economy.exact_quote: I think when companies come in and dump their products in the United States, they should pay automatically, let's say a 10% tax
economy.evidence: Implemented broad tariff increases, raising average tariff rates from 2.5% to 27%

economy.source: New York Economic Club August 15, 2024; Bedminster press conference August 15, 2024
economy.exact_quote: We will make the Trump tax cuts permanent
economy.evidence: One Big Beautiful Bill made the 2017 tax cuts permanent

economy.promise: Cut energy prices in half within 12-18 months
economy.exact_quote: Under my administration, we will be slashing energy and electricity prices by at least half within 12 months... 18 months max
economy.evidence: National energy emergency declared, increased drilling authorized

economy.promise: 'Drill, baby, drill' - increase domestic energy production
economy.evidence: National energy emergency declared to accelerate fossil fuel production

economy.promise: Cap credit card interest rates at 10%
economy.exact_quote: We're going to cap credit card interest rates at around 10%
economy.evidence: No action taken; typical rates remain around 22.8%

economy.exact_quote: I will cut your car insurance rates by 50%

foreign_policy.source: Made 53 times according to CNN fact-check
foreign_policy.exact_quote: I will have that war settled in one day â€” 24 hours
foreign_policy.evidence: Nearly three years after Russia launched invasion... there's no end in sight to the war

foreign_policy.promise: End Ukraine war before taking office
foreign_policy.exact_quote: I will get it settled before I even become president
foreign_policy.evidence: War continued through inauguration and beyond

foreign_policy.source: Milwaukee, Wisconsin rally November 1, 2024; America First Policy Institute speech September 7, 2023
foreign_policy.exact_quote: Make NATO allies pay their fair share
foreign_policy.evidence: Secured NATO agreement to increase defense spending targets from 2% to 5% of GDP by 2035

foreign_policy.exact_quote: Leave the Paris climate accord again
foreign_policy.evidence: Trump ordered the United States to leave the Paris climate agreement... will take at least a year to become official

foreign_policy.promise: Target Chinese ownership of US infrastructure
foreign_policy.exact_quote: Restrict Chinese ownership of US infrastructure such as energy, technology, telecommunications
foreign_policy.evidence: Various executive orders issued targeting Chinese investments

government_operations.exact_quote: I will sign their pardons on Day 1
government_operations.evidence: Trump issued 'full, complete and unconditional,' pardons on his first day in office for nearly 1,600 people

government_operations.promise: Fire federal workers more easily (Schedule F)
government_operations.source: Agenda47 policy video March 2023; Truth Social post October 12, 2024
government_operations.exact_quote: Make it easier to fire federal employees
government_operations.evidence: Schedule F has been reinstated, potentially affecting up to 50,000 federal employees

government_operations.source: Rapidian City, South Dakota rally September 8, 2023; Agenda47 policy video
government_operations.exact_quote: I will shut down the Department of Education
government_operations.evidence: Supreme Court ruled 6-3 July 14, 2025, allowing mass layoffs of 1,400+ employees (50% workforce reduction). Department significantly weakened but full closure requires Congressional action

government_operations.source: Madison Square Garden rally October 27, 2024 (announcement with Elon Musk)
government_operations.exact_quote: Create efficiency commission to cut spending
government_operations.evidence: Trump established... Department of Government Efficiency, launching effort led by Elon Musk

government_operations.source: Turning Point Action conference July 15, 2023; NRA convention May 17, 2024
government_operations.evidence: Federal death penalty has been restored and expanded to include drug trafficking and crimes by immigrants

government_operations.exact_quote: I will restore the Trump ban on transgender in the military
government_operations.evidence: SCOTUS allows trans military ban to go into effect

government_operations.promise: Cut federal workforce by 2 trillion dollars
government_operations.exact_quote: Cut at least $2 trillion in government spending
government_operations.evidence: 59,000 federal jobs eliminated but far short of $2 trillion target

social_issues.exact_quote: Abortion legislation should be left to the states
social_issues.evidence: Has not pursued federal abortion restrictions, maintained states' rights position

social_issues.source: Truth Social post November 14, 2023; Agenda47 policy video February 2023
social_issues.exact_quote: No more funding for NPR, a total scam!
social_issues.evidence: Congress passed $9 billion rescission package July 2025, eliminating $1.1 billion in CPB funding through 2027. Trump signed into law July 18, 2025

social_issues.source: NRA convention Indianapolis May 17, 2024; Harrisburg, Pennsylvania rally April 29, 2024
social_issues.exact_quote: I will be the best Second Amendment president
social_issues.evidence: Executive order signed February 2025 protecting Second Amendment rights, rolling back gun regulations

social_issues.source: Faith & Freedom Coalition conference June 24, 2023; Pray Vote Stand Summit September 15, 2023
social_issues.evidence: Religious Liberty Commission established May 2025, White House Faith Office restored

technology.exact_quote: We love TikTok. I'm going to save TikTok
technology.evidence: TikTok shut down... Multiple extensions granted but no permanent resolution

technology.source: Truth Social post May 8, 2024; Newsmax interview June 14, 2024
technology.evidence: No significant action taken despite nominations of reform advocates

technology.source: Agenda47 tech policy video March 2023; Truth Social post October 30, 2023
technology.exact_quote: Rescind Biden's AI Executive Order on Day One
technology.evidence: Biden AI Executive Order rescinded January 20, 2025

technology.source: Bitcoin 2024 conference Nashville July 27, 2024; Truth Social post June 12, 2024
technology.exact_quote: Make America the crypto capital of the planet
technology.evidence: Executive orders on cryptocurrency issued, regulatory framework being developed

healthcare.promise: Appoint RFK Jr. to health position
healthcare.exact_quote: RFK Jr. will have a big role in health
healthcare.evidence: RFK Jr. was confirmed as HHS Secretary as promised

healthcare.source: Mosinee, Wisconsin rally September 7, 2024; Truth Social post August 29, 2024
healthcare.evidence: Major ACA repeal efforts have stalled despite Republican control

healthcare.exact_quote: Cut US prescription drug prices by 30% to 80%
healthcare.evidence: Executive order issued with thirty-day deadline for drug companies

healthcare.source: Truth Social post August 29, 2024; Fox News town hall in Pennsylvania October 16, 2024
healthcare.exact_quote: Make IVF treatment available to everyone
healthcare.evidence: No federal legislation or coverage expansion implemented

election_integrity.source: Michigan GOP dinner April 20, 2024; Save America rally in Ohio March 26, 2022
election_integrity.evidence: Executive orders issued requiring proof of citizenship for voter registration

election_integrity.source: CPAC speech February 24, 2024; Truth Social post October 4, 2024
election_integrity.exact_quote: Paper ballot records while banning QR code ballots
election_integrity.evidence: Executive order implemented paper ballot requirements

election_integrity.source: New Hampshire primary victory speech January 23, 2024
election_integrity.exact_quote: One-day voting which would presumably remove early voting and voting by mail
election_integrity.evidence: No federal action taken; would require state-level changes

veterans_affairs.source: American Legion National Convention August 2024; Veterans Day speech November 11, 2024
veterans_affairs.exact_quote: We will end veteran homelessness entirely
veterans_affairs.evidence: National Center for Warrior Independence established May 2025 on West LA VA campus

veterans_affairs.source: VFW National Convention July 23, 2024; Fayetteville, North Carolina rally September 22, 2024
veterans_affairs.exact_quote: Give our veterans the best healthcare in the world
veterans_affairs.evidence: Veteran healthcare funding increased, new facilities approved

unusual_specific_promises.exact_quote: Make it tax deductible to purchase a home generator
unusual_specific_promises.evidence: Retroactive to Sept. 1, 2024 promise not included in tax legislation

unusual_specific_promises.promise: Build 10 Freedom Cities with flying cars
unusual_specific_promises.exact_quote: Build so-called 'Freedom Cities' to 'reopen the frontier, reignite American imagination'
unusual_specific_promises.evidence: No federal land development contests initiated
No significant action taken on this promise

biggest_broken_promises: Make Mexico pay for border wall
most_significant_kept_promises: Eliminate taxes on tips and overtime
analysis.six_month_plus_assessment: Executive action promises largely delivered, economic and diplomatic goals proved unrealistic. Supreme Court victories have enabled major government restructuring. NPR/PBS defunding and Education Department dismantling represent significant policy achievements, while Epstein list reversal damaged credibility with base.
